high_descs: Turn right, turn right to face the chair to the right of the door.
Pick up the cell phone closest to the edge of the chair.
Move to the left side of the desk to the right.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a cell phone and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the right and move across the room. Turn right to face the flowered chair.
Pick up the cell phone from the front of the chair.
Hold the cell phone and turn to the right and face the desk on the left in front of the clock.
Hold the cell phone and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Hold a phone and turn on the lamp.

high_descs: Turn right walk straight face the couch on your right
Pick up the cell phone on the edge of the couch
Turn right walk straight to the desk with lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the cell phone by the light
